statusLine.command: export PATH="/c/Users/ty210/bin:$PATH"; input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); total_in=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens // empty'); total_out=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens // empty'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name // empty'); vim_mode=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.vim.mode // empty'); printf '\033[36mModel:\033[0m %s' "$model"; [ -n "$vim_mode" ] && printf ' \033[90m›\033[0m \033[34m[%s]\033[0m' "$vim_mode"; printf ' \033[90m›\033[0m \033[36mDir:\033[0m %s' "$cwd"; git_branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.hooksPath=/dev/null rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then git_dirty=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.hooksPath=/dev/null status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_dirty" ]; then printf ' \033[90m›\033[0m \033[33m⎇ %s *\033[0m' "$git_branch"; else printf ' \033[90m›\033[0m \033[32m⎇ %s\033[0m' "$git_branch"; fi; fi; [ -n "$style" ] && printf ' \033[90m›\033[0m \033[36mStyle:\033[0m %s' "$style"; if [ -n "$used" ]; then if [ "$used" -ge 80 ] 2>/dev/null; then printf ' \033[90m›\033[0m \033[33mContext:\033[0m \033[33m%s%% used\033[0m' "$used"; elif [ "$used" -ge 60 ] 2>/dev/null; then printf ' \033[90m›\033[0m \033[36mContext:\033[0m \033[33m%s%% used\033[0m' "$used"; else printf ' \033[90m›\033[0m \033[36mContext:\033[0m %s%% used' "$used"; fi; fi; if [ -n "$total_in" ] && [ -n "$total_out" ]; then printf ' \033[90m›\033[0m \033[36mTokens:\033[0m \033[90min:%s out:%s\033[0m' "$total_in" "$total_out"; fi; printf '\n'
